title: Salt production and iodization practices among artisanal salt producers in selected districts within the Greater Accra and Central Regions of Ghana
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Benjamin Osei Tutu, Bella Rosaling Nkansah, Nana Akua Serwaa Yeboah, Faustina Atupra, Roderick Kwabena Daddey-Adjei, Delese A.A. Darko
